data.title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead [Blu-ray]
data.meta_description: POULTRYGEIST:NIGHT OF THE CHICKEN DEAD Troma’s first Blu-ray has finally hatched! “As savage as DAWN OF THE DEAD, as slapstick nutzoid as EVIL DEAD 2…
data.text:
POULTRYGEIST:NIGHT OF THE CHICKEN DEAD

Troma’s first Blu-ray has finally hatched!

“As savage as DAWN OF THE DEAD, as slapstick

nutzoid as EVIL DEAD 2…an exploitation movie with soul.”-Entertainment Weekly

When a fast food chicken restaurant is built on the site of an ancient Native American burial ground, the displaced spirits unite with the ghosts of exterminated chickens and transform into Indian chicken zombies seeking revenge! Now, it’s up to a dim-witted counter boy, his lesbian ex-girlfriend, and a burqa-wearing fry cook to put an end to the foul-feathered menace once and for all.
